m64tweak.name: Custom Mario Importing
m64tweak.description: Apply the tweaks in order and have a blank slate for importing a custom mario model.

patch.name: 1. Remove low poly Mario from ROM
patch.description: Fills the low poly Mario space (8381A8 - 840570) with 01s.

patch.name: 2. Replace low poly Mario with invisible model
patch.description:
Disables low poly Mario.
Replaces low poly Mario with an invisible model (empty Fast3D display list) that is only 16 bytes.
RAM segment address for invisible model: 04014638

patch.name: 3. Make Metal, Vanish, and Wingcap Mario use same model as normal Mario
patch.description: Makes Metal Mario, Vanish Mario, and Wingcap Mario use the same model as normal Mario.

patch.name: 4. Make all Mario model invisible not removing models from ROM
patch.description:
Run the "2. Replace low poly Mario with invisible model" tweak first before this or it won't work.
For now it only replaces the normal Mario model and Wingcap Mario model.
